Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Luwaina "Lamb"
Reviews.Content: Asus nailed it with this laptop and for an amazing price you can't get much better than this awesome laptop.

ProductInfo.Features:
11.6 in HD LED-backlit (1366 x 768), 10-finger multi-touch support
Intel Celeron N2815 1.86 GHz with Burst Performance Technology up to 2.13 GHz
4GB DDR3 1600 MHz/500GB 5400 RPM HDD/Windows 8.1, 64-bit
3-cell lithium-ion (up to 5 hours)/HD webcam/2 in 1 card reader (SD/SDHC/SDXC/MMC)/11.90 x 7.90 x 1.20 in/2.86 lbs
1 USB 3.0 • 2 USB 2.0 • HDMI • VGA • Headphone output/Microphone input combo • RJ-45
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS X200MA-US01T 11.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop/Intel Celeron N2815/4GB memory/500GB HDD/Win 8.1 (Black)
